item.title: MIUI V13.0.5.0.SLDCNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 12X China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12X China

Codename: psyche

Version: V13.0.5.0.SLDCNXM | 12.0

Size: 4.2 GB

MD5: 0b5427be43b2939246aa337bece25ba2

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to June 2022. Increased system security.
[Mi Smart Hub]
New: Mi Smart Hub now allows transferring audio and video playback to other connected devices
New: You can now use Mi Smart Hub for app handoff across connected devices
New: Mi Smart Hub now offers options for your smartphones, tablets, and TVs
New: You can control your devices and use Mi Smart Hub in Control center now

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
